definition: flat peach (aka Saturn peach or donut peach)/the peaches of immortality kept by Xi Wangmu 西王母
to coil
peach
a victory banquet to taste the peaches of immortality of Goddess Xi Wangmu 西王母

sentences.english: The peach of immortality in Chinese mythology.
sentences.chinese: 神话里的蟠桃具有长生不死的功效。

sentences.english: The donut peach stands among my other plants.
He flies into a peach garden and eats as many peaches as he likes .
sentences.chinese: 它飞进蟠桃园，而且尽情的品尝了许多他喜欢的蟠桃。
